name: INRestaurantGuestDisplayPreferences
desc: Options about how to display guest information from system interfaces.

items.name: var nameFieldShouldBeDisplayed: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether to display the guest’s name should.

items.name: var phoneNumberFieldShouldBeDisplayed: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether to display the guest’s phone number.

items.name: var emailAddressFieldShouldBeDisplayed: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether to display the guest’s email address.

items.name: var nameFieldFirstNameOptional: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the reservation requires the guest’s first name.

items.name: var nameFieldLastNameOptional: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the reservation requires the guest’s last name.

items.name: var nameEditable: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the name fields are editable.

items.name: var emailAddressEditable: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the email address field is editable.

items.name: var phoneNumberEditable: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the phone number field is editable.
